1/4 cup finely chopped red bell pepper
2 (3-inch) fresh green chiles such as Thai or serrano, minced (including seeds)
2 lb beefsteak tomatoes, cut into 1-inch wedges
3/4 lb cucumbers, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
1/2 cup loosely packed fresh Thai anise basil leaves
1/2 cup loosely packed fresh Thai lemon basil leaves
1/2 cup loosely packed fresh cilantro leaves

name: Tom Kha Gai - Thai Chicken Coconut Soup
ingredients: 7 ounces (200g) chicken, thinly sliced bite-sized pieces (I use thigh meat)

name: Tom Yum Goong (Hot and Sour Thai Prawn Soup)
ingredients: 2 lemongrass stalks, cut into 1" pieces and smashed a bit (about 1/3 cup)
6 kaffir lime leaves (1 tablespoon), torn with centre vein removed
2 tablespoons Thai shallots, whole with skin removed (1-2 shallots)
1/2 cup straw mushrooms, ends removed and halved
2 tablespoons (about 7) red medium-sized Thai chillies, smashed
1 tablespoon lime juice (or more to taste)

name: Tom Yum Thai Soup
ingredients: 3 thin slices fresh galanga ( or frozen)
2 stalks lemongrass cut into 2,3 cm lengths
1/2 cup sliced shitake mushrooms ( can be also straw mushrooms)
1 spoon chilli paste (Thai Tom Yum paste)

name: Vegetable Pad Thai
ingredients: 2 scallions, sliced (white and green parts divided)
1 tablespoon Sriracha or garlic chile sauce

name: Vegetarian Pad Thai
ingredients: 1/2 pound wide rice stick noodles (bánh pho)
1 (12.3-ounce) package extrafirm tofu, drained and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

name: Vietnamesische Sommerrollen im Thai Style - Glücksrollen
ingredients: 10 Blatt Reispapier, vietnamesisches, rund, 22 cm Durchmesser
150 g Hähnchenbrust, gehackt oder durch den Wolf gedreht
15 g Schalotte(n) oder Zwiebeln, fein gehackt
1 TL Currypulver oder Paste, 'hot' oder 'sweet' nach Geschmack
2 TL Palmzucker oder Rohrzucker, 'normaler' Zucker oder Honig
Pfeffer, schwarzer, frisch gemahlen, nach Wunsch
1 Zweig/e Basilikum, Thai-, frisch, nur Blätter
40 g Eisbergsalat, in ca. 3-4 mm breite und 4 cm lange Streifen geschnitten
100 ml Sauce, Thai Sweet & Sour Chilisauce (Naam Jim Priau Wan), zum Dippen

name: Weinender Tiger (Seua Rong Hai)
ingredients: 500 g Steak(s) vom Rind (z. B. Entrecôte)
2 Knolle/n Knoblauch (optimalerweise der asiatische, der „am Stück“ kommt und nicht in so vielen Einzel-Zehen)

name: World's Best Mussels! Steamed in a Thai Curry-White Wine Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 to 3/4 lb. fresh mussels, or 1 pack frozen mussels (I buy frozen organic) - keep frozen until ready to cook
1/3 cup finely chopped shallots or purple onion
1 tsp. fish sauce, plus more to taste
1-2 chopped loose cups fresh coriander/cilantro (chop just before serving)

name: Würziger Rindfleischsalat nach Thai - Art
ingredients: 6 Chilischote(n), z.B. Jalapenos, je nach Schärfegrat mit und ohne Kerne oder weniger
1 Kopf Salat, die ganzen geputzten Blätter verwenden
1 Salatgurke(n), geschält und in dünne Scheiben geschnitten
12 Kirschtomate(n), halbiert, ersatzweise 3 Flaschentomaten in Scheiben geschnitten
1 kleine Zwiebel(n), rot, in dünne Scheiben geschnitten

name: Yum Jin Gai (Spicy Northern Thai-Style Chicken Soup)
ingredients: 1 whole small chicken (about 2 1/2 pounds), legs and breasts removed, carcass reserved
1 (1/4-inch piece) mace, or 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1 (1/4-inch piece) mace, or 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1 (1/4-inch piece) mace, or 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
4 pods black cardamom, inner seeds only, or 1 pod green cardamom
4 pods black cardamom, inner seeds only, or 1 pod green cardamom
3 thin slices galangal (or ginger if galangal is not available)
1 stalk lemongrass, bottom 4 inches only, bruised multiple times with the dull side of a knife blade
4 ounces button mushrooms, cut into quarters
